name: Monsters & Anomaly
description:
Monsters & Anomaly is a fun platformer with beautiful design and dynamic music.
You are a cheerful and cheerful monster that faces unexplained anomalies in your world that cause a change in gravity and black holes.
Embark on a long and dangerous journey full of mysteries, traps and your favorite gold coins.
You can either get rich by the end or ... Your adventure will end in one of the anomalies.
Next to the adventure!

Features:
- Beautiful drawn graphics
- Dynamic and soothing music
- Interesting gameplay
- Easy to understand management
- Advanced levels
